sources.title: Wots All th' Shootin' fer (1940)
sources.description: The cats of two feuding hillbilly families make for a Romeo and Julliet love affair. the gun play mounts in fury until they realize the two have kittens, and quarrel ends. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/wots-all-th-shootin-fer-1940/

metadata.Plot: The cats of two feuding hillbilly families make for a Romeo and Julliet love affair. the gun play mounts in fury until they realize the two have kittens, and quarrel ends.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
